g.title: n3
g.text: Not all states may be updated)

g.title: f1
g.text: Q values updated at end of every episode

g.title: f2
g.text: Q values updated at end of every episode
New π - Greedy w.r.t current Q

g.title: f3
g.text: Q values updated every time step
New π using ε-greedy policy (greedy in the limit)

g.title: f4
g.text: Q values updated every time step

g.title: ff4
g.text: - uses expectation of action values in update
- uses 2 Q functions to overcome maximization bias

g.title: h1
g.text: Use action-value to select an action

g.title: h2
g.text: Use action-value to select an action
